prompts: Create a grass-type Pokemon that resembles a small acorn with a leafy top.
I want a cute Pokemon with a round body and a shiny gray hat.
Generate a tiny creature that blends into forest environments with earthy colors.
Make a Pokemon that rolls like an acorn and has big, expressive eyes.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in grasslands and has a fun personality.
Design a small Pokemon that looks like a seed and is friendly to trainers.
Give me a whimsical Pokemon that has a nutty appearance and loves nature.
